runs.comm: One slip in place. He starts with a length delivery just outside off stump and Kamran shoulders arms
offers width on this occasion and Kamran loves going square, be it the drive or the cut shot. This time he opts for the horizontal shot and the ball screams to the point boundary
fuller, straighter, Kamran is late in getting forward and pushes it out to square of the wicket on the off side
in the channel outside off stump, shapes away, Kamran leaves it alone
this one comes in from outside off, Kamran stays back to defend it to the off side
really full outside off stump, Kamran, again, doesn't come out in time, leans forward in the end, almost yorks himself in the process and the ball swings past his bat
full in length, on the middle, bit of inward movement, and Salman wrists it uppishly but through the gap in midwicket
slants this one across Salman who lets Boucher gather it
around the off stump line, from a length, pushed out to covers

The bouncer does the trick. Even on this slow pitch. Oh well. It was a banged in short and Salman goes for the pull shot but edges it to mid-on. He gets into a horrible position for that kind of a shot.
And  so Steyn tries another bouncer. Why not?He has just got a wicket. But this one slips outside leg
leans forward to push this one to mid-on

full and loverly delivery; it shaped away late and again Kamran was hanging on the back foot. He doesn't like getting forward and is squared up by this delivery. To his credit, though, he didn't chase the ball, ended up pushing hist bat inside the line
short in length and outside off, Khalid Latif plays a ugly swat shot .. the ball rolls towards mid-on
full in length and moves further away, left alone
on the middle and leg, turned towards deep backward square-leg region where Steyn mops up
around the off stump line, punched out to covers
fetches the length delivery from almost  off, clears his front foot and drags it to Steyn at deep backward square-leg region
hurls across a bouncer on the off stump line and Kamran sways away from the line of fire
Whack. He pressed back, fetched teh short-of-length delivery from outside off and slugs it past square-leg
he chooses to stay back to a length delivery and ends up pushing out to covers
fuller, around the off stump line, much like Kamran, Latif chooses to stay back to this full delivery and pushes it back to the bowler

And that penchant to stay on the back foot and try playing to the on side has done him in. It was full length delivery, Latif pressed back, cleared his front foot and tried to slog across the line but lobs it to right of mid-on where Steyn lunges out to collect it
short in length, moves in to the middle, Kamran hops back to clip it to left of short fine-leg fielder who deflects it towards Gibbs, running in from deep square-leg region
Now Kamran gets into trouble with the back-foot play. He is very late in getting forward to a full length delivery and is beaten outside off stump
short in length, bounces outside off stump, pushed out to covers
lovely delivery. Fuller and swinging away late, Hafiz is almost squared up as he shaped to play it down the track and edges it to point region
on the middle and leg, worked past square-leg
around the off-stump, pushed out to point
just outside off stump, pushed out to cover

Trapped in front! Just as many of our feedbackers had feared, Hafiz didn't last long. It was full delivery on the off and middle stump line and he played all around it. Poor Balance. Poor shot selection. Gone!
full in length on the off stump line, driven to the off side
banged in short and Kamran goes down under
cuts in from just outside off to beat the defensive prod and strikes him on the thigh pad
short in length and this has been dragged to Gibbs at deep square-leg
banged in short on the middle stump line, Umar hops to stab it to the on side
full in length, on the off stump line, leans forward to defend
flighted outside off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
turns in to the middle stump line, turned to short fine-leg
flighted fuller, pushed out back to the bowler
jumps out to the track and pushed out to midwicket
floats this one down the leg side
stays back to stab the off break to the on side
goes down on his knee to sweep it to deep midwicket
leans forward to work this one towards deep midwicket
The slog sweep! He cleared the front foot and swept the full delivery to cow corner.
full delivery, swept away to long-leg
Thump! Umar Akmal goes the route of his brother. He too cleared the front foot and slog-swept it high over midwicket boundary. It's a big ground but he has managed to clear the boundary.
ooh .. full delivery but Umar was caught on the back foot and he manages to lunged forward at the last minute and poke the ball to point
slips down the leg side
charges down the track and lofts it to left of long-on for a single
moves outside leg stump at the last minute and plays a feisty cut shot to a ball on the off and middle. And what's more he finds the gap wide of sweeper cover
backs away again and lunges out this time to drive to right of sweeper cover
quicker and he follows Kamran who was again moving outside leg and it has been pushed back the down the track
turns into the off stump line, dabbed to left of short third-man for a single
he goes for the reverse sweep but doesn't connect well ... the ball rolls to covers
moves outside leg and shapes for the big hit through the off side but doesn't connect well. Mid-off moves to his left to stop it
this time he moves towards the off side but mistimes the shot towards Steyn at long-on
short in length around off stump, Kamran mistimes the attempted pull to short midwicket
slower bouncer on the middle, pulled towards deep midwicket
full delivery outside off, pushed out to cover
shapes for the paddle shot but Albie adjusts by shortening the length further and pushing it further outside off and Umar adjusts to stab it to short fine-leg region
Fabulous strike. Umar rushes down the track, stays outside the line and lofts it with the turn over long-off.
leans forward to push it to the off side
plays the sweep shot to collect a single
Bosh! Kamran joins in the six-bashing fun. He moves down the track, gets outside the line and whacks this one over long-off.

Mucherly fun this. Van der Merwe switched to over the wicket but Kamran didn''t change his aggressive mindset. He ran down the track, stayed outside the line of the delivery and lifted it with the turn over the straight boundary. Very skillful.
But he is gone now. It was again from over the wicket, turning away from Kamran who went for the cut shot this time. Blink. Gibbs dives to his right at backward point to take a good catch.
stays back to clip the short-of-length delivery past square-leg
short in length and outside off, Umar cuts but AB makes another diving stop at backward point
works this one past square-leg for a single
in the zone outside off stump and Afridi is beaten, trying to push it to third man
Afridi backs away to the leg side and attempts a slog but is beaten by the slow bouncer. Boucher collects. Steyn lets his tongue out and Afridi smiles
short in length on the middle, Afridi shaped to pull, tried to changed his mind and in the end swats it to the on side
Crunch! Afridi moves well outside the leg stump, reaches out to a very full delivery outside off and scoops it over covers! And he has a laugh about it.
Thrash! He stayed back this time to a delivery pitched short of length and pulled it over midwicket.

shout for lbw and the umpire makes no signal for leg bye.Afridi had moved across to the off side and probably gets an inside edge to a full delivery that swung in .. it hit the pad on the full perhaps just outside off
works this one to midwicket
Delicious paddle scoop. He leaned across, took the ball on the full, from outside off and paddles it over short fine-leg fielder
And he tries that shot again. No success this time. Full delivery outside off stump, he doesn't connect with the paddle shot and Boucher collects. Umar kicks the ground
low full toss on the off stump line, sliced away to deep point region

Fabulicious! He shuffled to the off side and swung the length delivery from the middle and leg stump line over deep backward square-leg boundary. Not dissimilar to the shot that Moin Khan used to play so well. ..
works this past square-leg for a single
Thunderous blow! Violence! It was the low dipping full toss and Afridi sent the ball screaming over long-on
shuffles across to the off side, tries to play the paddle sweep and it goes off the pad to the off side
length delivery well outside off, Umar ends up dragging it to long-on. Had he chosen to go over the off-side he wold have probably got a boundary but he had pre-meditated to go to the on side ..
gets it on the block hole, jabbed out past the diving Kallis
from round the stumps, another really full delivery, pushed out wide of midwicket
the bouncer from over the wicket, Umar top edges the pull over midwicket
moves to round the stumps for Afridi and actually serves a full toss on the legs. Afridi swat-flicks it well but straight to deep backward square-leg
full pitched on the middle, Umar clears the front foot and drills it to left of AB at long-on
moves outside leg stump and square drives a full pitched delivery to deep point region
from round the stumps arrives a slower one, Afridi moves outside leg , tries to adjust to the change in pace by gliding it to third man but makes no contact
taps this full delivery to right of Albie at square-leg for a single
Mowed across the line! he cleared the front leg, fetched the slower delivery from outside off and dragged it to the cow corner - between deep midwicket and long-on
works this through the on side for a single
Steyn rushes in from round the stumps, Afridi moves outside leg and goes the big off drive to a full delivery but gets a fat edge that takes  the ball through the vacant slip cordon
Scoop of violence! He moved outside leg, lunged forward to pick the length delivery, used his bottom hand over time to lift it powerfully to the right of long-on

Wallop! What a hit. What a bundle of joy this Umar Akmal is. A spine-tingling delight. He cleared the front leg and smeared through the line. Up up the white ball soared and sailed over the straight boundary
yorker on the off and middle, pushed out to the off side
And he is gone now. Fine knock. 51 from 33 balls. He went for a six over long-on but couldn't clear the fielder. The Umar show is over. It was fun while it lasted.
shuffles to the off side and flicks it to deep square-leg
Afridi moves outside leg, perhaps too far down the leg side and Langeveldt pushes it further outside off.. left alone and it's not a wide
Clatterr!! Afridi, again, moved outside leg and Langeveldt hurls it full on the off stump line. Afridi tries to glide it to third man but makes no contact.  A breezy innings from Afridi.
leans across to drive to sweeper cover
full in length outside off, pushed out to covers
fuller, outside off, driven back to Albie who makes a mess of a regulation stop to give away an single
full pitched outside off stump, driven to deep cover
slower one, on a length on the off and middle line, pushed out wide of short midwicket
full delivery outside off, mistimes the drive to covers
in the zone outside off, moves past the attempted slog and Boucher collects
full delivery outside off, sliced down to third man
full and well outside off, Misbah reaches out to slice it to third man. Good over so far. Just three runs.
low outswinging full toss around the off stump line, flies off the edge towards deep backward point region.
straighter, almost at the blockhole, flicked through midwicket for a single
run out of Misbah missed by Steyn. The near-yorker was pushed out to the on side of the pitch. Misbah wanted a run, Razzaq wanted the strike .. Misbah had given up but Steyn couldn't find the stumps
fullish delivery outside off stump, sliced away to deep point region for a single
moves well outside off, tries the paddle shot and fails to connect.. Razzaq gets across for a chat
Full delivery and Misbah ends up slicing it straight to AB at long-off. Langeveldt picks up his fourth wicket. He has bowled really well in the end overs here to restrict Pakistan
low full toss on the off stump line, driven to right of AB at long-off and they come back for the second run
full pitched on the middle, driven towards long-on
low full dipping full toss, sliced away to deep point and they come back for the second run
